resources.string: • Requires a combination of luck and logic in order to not get completely wasted.
• Assign one player as dealer; the rest of the players should arrange themselves in a circle or around a table
• Dealer asks each player a different question for each round
• Once the player makes a guess, the dealer flips the next card
• Correct guesses mean the player gives away drinks. Incorrect guesses mean player takes drinks.
• Players drink and give drinks to other players based on cards drawn from a standard deck of cards.
• Shuffle the deck of cards and spread in a circle around an empty cup (called the "King's Cup")
• Each player then takes turns drawing a card and must follow the corresponding action
• Jungle juice in the middle. Last man standing drinks.
• Place an empty cup in the middle -> everyone pour in a small amount of their drink
• Each player place one finger on the rim of the cup
• On the count of 3, all players decide to either keep their finger on the cup or remove it
• At the same time, the first person must guess how many fingers will remain on the cup
• If the player guessed correctly, the player is out
• The last player remaining must drink the cup in the middle
A fun activity to enjoy by yourself or with friends.
Start drinking; each player starts drinking at the same time as the person to their left. Player cannot stop until the player before them stops.
Pick a player to take a drink.
All females must take a drink.
Put your thumb on the table in a sneaky manner and the last person who puts their thumb on the table must drink.
All males must take a drink.
Everyone must raise their hand/finger and point to the sky. The last person to do so must take a drink.
Choose a person to be your date. They drink when you drink for the rest of the game.
Say a word; the person to your right has to say a rhyming word. Continue around the table until someone cannot think of a word -> this person must drink.

Pick a category of things; the person to your right must come up with something that falls within that category. Continue around the table until someone cannot come up with anything -> this person must drink.
Make a rule that will last the entire game. If broken, the violator must drink.
You are now the "Question Master" until the next Queen is drawn. Whenever a player answers one of your questions, they must take a drink.
Pour some of your drink into the Kings Cup. When the last king is drawn, the player must drink the entire cup.
